If you were keeping a list of all the fun things you’ve done so far in your life, which three things would you put at the very top of the list?
If you could create a new candy bar, what would you name it and what would be inside of it?
If you were a teacher, what is one book you would insist that your whole class read?
If you could get a one-hour lesson from any professional athlete, whom would you want to give you the lesson?
In your opinion, which person whom you know has the funniest-sounding sneeze?
What sound can you imitate the best?
If you could put any message you wanted on a billboard along a busy highway, what would the billboard say?  (You can’t use more than 10 words, so make each one count!)
What do you think is the most important thing that friends can do for each other?
What event or activity in the next two months are you looking forward to more than anything else?
What is the best gift you’ve ever received?
If you had to choose between exploring outer space or the bottom of the deepest ocean, which one would you choose?
If you could enter a food-eating contest, which food would you be the most delighted to devour?
What is something you’ve done only one time so far in your life that you can’t wait to do a second time?
What is one subject currently not being taught in your school that you would love to see added to your learning experience?
In your opinion, what is the nicest thing you’ve ever done for your parents?  How about for a friend?
What would your dream house look like?  Be as descriptive as possible.
As the Christmas season approaches, what song is it that you just can’t wait to hear?
If you had to write your own personal definition of the word “success,” what would it be?
What is one piece of advice that you wish you could pass along to everyone else?
What was your favorite thing to pretend when you were a young child?
If you could have the voice of any famous person, living or deceased, whose voice would you want to claim as your own?
What is one talent you have that few people know about, or something you can do quite well that might surprise others?
What world record would you most want to establish if you could?
You’ve no doubt heard the expression, “They couldn’t pay me enough to do that job.”  What job would that be for you?
If snow could fall in any flavor, what flavor would you choose?
What is the best piece of advice you have ever received in your life?
If you could enter a racehorse in the Kentucky Derby, what would you name your horse?
When was the last time you laughed so hard that you cried?
What is one item you own that you really should throw away… but probably never will?
If you were making a list of five things (not people!) that make you happiest in your life, what five things would you write down?
